me.description1: I am Mauricio MuÃ±oz, a Senior Full-Stack Developer. Throughout my experience, I have learned to take an idea or problem and turn it into a solid, scalable, and maintainable product.
me.description2: Over the past 10+ years, I have contributed to products used by thousands of people in the E-commerce, Retail, and Education sectors, with the goal of seeing satisfied users and generating real value after every delivery.

frontend_development.title: Frontend Development
frontend_development.description: I create intuitive and responsive interfaces with great performance and visual consistency. I use React, TypeScript, Redux, and Material UI to deliver reusable, well-tested components ready to grow with the product.

backend_development.title: Backend Development
backend_development.description: I design microservices and decoupled architectures on AWS, and build secure, high-performance RESTful APIs using Node.js, NestJS, and .NET. I continuously strengthen my DevOps and NoSQL skills to improve my continuous delivery.

highlight_box.title: ðŸš€ How far can a well-built idea go?
highlight_box.description1: My experience in e-commerce, retail, and education has taught me that technology is universal, but its application is a specific and exciting challenge in every domain.
highlight_box.description2: I am open to new challenges to learn, adapt, and lead projects in any industry. With my Full-Stack profile, I guarantee immediate value from day one.
